plan.summary: Add __eq__ and __hash__ methods to Todo dataclass to enable equality comparison based on id field and allow Todo objects to be used in sets/dicts

tdd_sequence.description: Create failing test file with 6 test cases covering equality, hash, set membership, dict keys, and non-Todo comparison
Add __eq__ and __hash__ methods to Todo class after __repr__ method

verification_commands: uv run ruff check src/flywheel/todo.py tests/test_issue_4468_todo_eq_hash.py

acceptance_criteria: Todo(id=1, text='a') == Todo(id=1, text='b') returns True (based on id equality)
Todo objects can be used as set elements or dict keys
hash(todo) returns stable value based on id
